tasks.title: Project Setup and Foundation
tasks.description: Vite + React 19 + TypeScript + TailwindCSS 4 + Vitest + dependencies (culori, codemirror 6, json5)

tasks.title: Core Types and Color Conversion
tasks.description: TypeScript types for Zed themes, color conversion utilities (hex/RGB/HSL/OKLCH) using Culori, gamut detection, precision handling

tasks.title: File Handling and JSON5 Parsing
tasks.description: useFileAccess hook with File System Access API + fallback, JSON5 parsing with color normalization, DropZone component

tasks.title: State Management
tasks.description: useThemeEditor hook with React Context + useReducer, useLocalStorage for preferences

tasks.title: NumberField Component
tasks.description: Custom numeric input with arrow key modifiers (±1/±0.1/±10/±0.01), domain clamping, hue wrapping, precision handling

tasks.title: Color Editor Panel
tasks.description: Visual color picker (gradient square, hue/alpha sliders), multi-format inputs (Hex/RGB/HSL/OKLCH), gamut warnings

tasks.title: CodeMirror JSON Editor
tasks.description: CodeMirror 6 integration with JSON syntax highlighting, inline color swatch widgets, click-to-select colors

tasks.title: Theme Tabs
tasks.description: Multi-theme support with tab switching, appearance indicators, state persistence across themes

tasks.title: File Saving and Undo/Redo
tasks.description: Save with File System Access API, Cmd+S shortcut, undo/redo with debounced history, unsaved changes tracking

tasks.title: Theme Preview and UI Polish
tasks.description: Editor/terminal preview mockups, Toolbar with dark/light toggle, responsive layout, accessibility features
